de.iss.mv2.messaging

Class MV2Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.messaging.MV2CommunicationElement
      • de.iss.mv2.messaging.MV2Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CertificateResponeMessage, ClientCertificateRequest, ClientCertificateResponse, ClientLoginData, ClientLoginRequest, ContentMessage, DomainNamesRequest, DomainNamesResponse, EncryptedMessage, HelloMessage, KeyPutRequest, MessageDeliveryRequest, MessageFetchRequest, MessageFetchResponse, MessageQueryRequestMessage, MessageQueryResponseMessage, ServerLoginResponse, SpaceCreationRequest, SpaceCreationResponse, UnableToProcessMessage

    public class MV2Message
extends MV2CommunicationElement
    A message that can be sent to a communication partner.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
